posts.post_title: FS BL 350 McGinnity and Hindu Lindaman SGC 30
posts.post_content:
Two Tough back cards

SGC 30 Iron Man McGinnity HOF $650

Vive Lindaman SGC 30 but looks MUCH nicer.  Back a bit OC but still nice.  $450 OBO
[IMG]http://www.thetoyheaven.com/images/items/baseballcards/bbct206hindu.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.thetoyheaven.com/images/items/baseballcards/bbct206hinduft.jpg[/IMG]

First to say they want them gets them.  S&H one me insurance on you.

Questions drop me an email.  Thanks

James G
Jim, Email sent on Lindaman-Hindu.   Thanks,  Marc

Cards still available, may consider trades for SGC HOFs.
